item.title: CVE-2023-47806|2024-08-02T21:16:43.684Z -- saint%20systems -- disable%20user%20login
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Saint Systems Disable User Login.This issue affects Disable User Login: from n/a through 1.3.7.
